text: 13.10 Jon 6.64, 6.70-71, 15.3 Anɨb agek, Jisas nop agak, Bɨ olap ñɨg lɨ yokek, wak okok mɨdupsek gach ma mɨdeb ak nɨm, tepayaŋ ñɨg ma lɨ yokɨnɨmuŋ agak. Pen tob kɨd anep ñɨg lɨ yokonɨmuŋ, wak okok mɨdupsek tepayaŋ gach ma mɨdeb agak. Nɨbi gach sek ma mɨdebɨm ak pen, nokom olap nep gach sek mɨdeb agak.
